test_vectors.name: syscall_get_external_code_size
test_vectors.description: Get bytecode size of external contract

test_vectors.name: syscall_get_external_code_size_nonexistent
test_vectors.description: Code size of non-existent contract returns 0

test_vectors.description: Get BLAKE3 hash of external contract bytecode

test_vectors.description: Copy portion of external contract bytecode

test_vectors.name: syscall_get_external_code_copy_partial
test_vectors.description: Copy beyond bytecode returns shorter result

test_vectors.name: syscall_code_elf_validation
test_vectors.description: Contract bytecode must be valid ELF format
